This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to create her own music band to play in the wedding ceremony and other parties. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is 45 years old and a married woman with 7 children, 5 of whom are attending school. She’s a very hardworking woman who aspires to obtain ahead and improve her business day to day. Hong is skillful in making bamboo baskets, generating approximately 2.50USD each day from this type of business. “More productivity, more profit” is her method to attain a success in life.  However, the main income provider is her husband works as a policeman in his local commune. 

Due to the lack of the family’s owned vehicle, Hong would like to acquire a loan to purchase a motorcycle for both home and business use. For her prospect, Hong wants to involve herself in trading bamboo baskets in a border market between Cambodia and Thailand.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for both home and business use.

loans.name: Yoeury

texts.en:
Yoeury, 59, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over twenty years, have an extensive experience and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice, vegetables and fattening up cattle. Approximately, they earn USD 10 per day. One of her children is employed in a hotel and earns about USD 5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Yoeury is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she plans to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide better living condition for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Teav

texts.en:
Teav is 53 years old and is a married woman who has been living in a small village of Batey district, Kompong Cham province. She has a big family consisting of 7 children; four are single and three are married. One among her children acts as a seamstress and provides sewing services to local people. Teav’s main business is rice farming. She has been managing in this business for over 30 years with experiences. Normally, she grows rice twice a year on her own farmland and she has her spouse help her in this business.

At the present, Teav would like to take out a loan to build a store for her daughter to provide her sewing service. She is very happy for the loan granted and she hopes that she will obtain a good profit from the investment.

loans.use: to build a store for her daughter to provide her sewing service.

loans.name: Tun's Group

texts.en:
Tun lives in Saang village. She is 41 years old and married with 2 children. Both of her sons are staying with the family, one of whom is still in school and another one works as a blacksmith. To earn a living, she has been fishing, growing taro and cultivating rice paddy for almost thirty years. Her family earns around six dollars per day and after netting expense they can save about one dollar and half per day. 
This is her second loan with VisionFund. She applied for the first loan in 2011. After completely repaid the first loan, she requested another one hoping to get the money to buy piglets and fertilizer for her taro plantation. She hopes that the loan can help to improve the living standard of her family and can support her son for high education. Tun now leads a loan group of three female members.

loans.use: To buy piglets and fertilizers

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
Keo, 30, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over five years, and are successful in their business. They are involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle. Approximately, they earn USD 7 per day. 

Due to lack of fund, Keo is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer to grow. This money will help her acquires the security to start the business. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer to grow

loans.name: Battsetseg

texts.en: Battsetseg is a 31 years old woman who lives with her daughter, mother and her sister. She has been running garment retails business in Govi-Altai province in Southern Mongolia. She has been running garment retails business since 2008. She has an experience before running the business. Based on the experience, she bought a shop counter where she sells clothes for men, women and children. Now she is planning the expand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities. Battsetseg is a good-natured woman who says that "I would like to develop the business by bringing the garment in large quantities so that I could raise the income without spending much on transportation". The total amount she is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy more garment.

loans.use: To buy more garment

loans.name: Moul

texts.en:
Moul is 49, a windowed woman who permanently resides in Reussey Keo commune, Phnom Penh city. She lives with 4 single children, 3 of whom are employed to help their mother to earn the income. Moul devotes herself in the business of cultivating rice on a three-hectare farmland to produce income. She typically earns approximately 1.50USD per day from the business. 

And now Moul is asking for a loan from HKL to pay for the rice cultivation. She hopes to obtain a good harvest from this investment. Moul has been a client of HKL for more than three years and this is her third loan, through which she’ll be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to pay for the rice cultivation.

loans.name: Chuluunsuh

texts.en: Chuluunsuh is a 54 years old man who lives with his wife in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. His wife is unemployed. He has been running taxi service business since 2006. Previously, he used to work as a driver for 29 years for the private company. He has changed the car and bought a car for his son. He is an experienced and talented driver whose business has been successful and profitable. Chuluunsuh is a hardworking and good man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by having my car repaired. I am planning to replace its motor. Due to the unpaved roads, it has been broken down. I want to continue my business by having it repaired". The total amount he is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to replace the car motor.

loans.use: To replace the car motor

loans.name: Khvaen

texts.en:
Khvaen, 23, married, resides with her husband and one child in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops and breeding pigs to sell for over two years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Khvaen is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase pig’s fodder rebuild her pig barn. This money will enable her get a bigger pig barn. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase pig's fodder and rebuild her pig barn

loans.name: Saeng's Group

texts.en: As a widow of one child, Saeng supports her family by cultivating rice and growing gingers and taro. She is now 48 years old. Her son is still in school. Saeng has been with VisionFund since 2011. Now she is applying for a second loan from VisionFund after her first loan was completely repaid. She requested the loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her rice field and taro plant. She now leads a three-member loan group of all female. She hopes with the money from VisionFund, her crops yield can be increased so as to sell them in good price so that her family can live in a good condition and especially save money for her son’s higher education.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Bayarmagnai

texts.en:
Bayarmagnai is a 27 years old woman who lives with her daughter, sister and parents in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. She has graduated from the college as an English translator. But, there was no opportunity in the town to find a job. Therefore, she started garment retailing business. She orders the products from Germany and the USA through the internet shops based on her English language. The business activity is going well and the customers appreciate the qualified products that she supplies. Bayarmagnai is a diligent woman who says that ""I would like to expand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities so that I could raise the income"". The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to buy the garment.
"

loans.use: To buy the garment

loans.name: Enhnaran

texts.en: Enhnaran is a 48 years old woman who lives with her husband and 2 children in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. Her husband is employed and the children study at the secondary school. She has started food retailing business in 1995. Since 2000, she has been running the business successfully. She trades vegetables like, potato, onion, carrot, and cabbage. She is planning to increase the types of the products. Enhnaran is a smart woman who says that "I would like to develop the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities and also purchasing the new types of vegetable". The total amount she is requesting is 300,000 MNT to buy more vegetables at whole sale prices.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables at whole sale prices

loans.name: Enhtsetseg

texts.en:
Enhtsetseg is a 28 years old woman who lives with her daughter and parents in Dornod province in Eastern  Mongolia. Her daughter is 3 years old. Her husband is employed but works in the capital city. She has been running the business of garment retails since 2005, when she was a student. Since that time, she became financially independent, paid the college tuition fee by herself. She purchases and brings the products from China and trades them in a well- positioned shop counter of the town. Enhtsetseg is a intelligent woman who says that ""I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the products in wholesale so that I could save the transportation expenses and raise the income"". The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to purchase the garment from China. 
"

loans.use: To purchase the garment from China

loans.name: Purevdorj

texts.en: Purevdorj is a 23 years old man who lives with his wife and a son in Govi-Altai province in Southern Mongolia. His wife is unemployed but makes the traditional clothes at home. He has been making wooden products since 2007, when he was graduated the college. He is a professional person on the field and creates different kinds of products. He has been improving the household with the income from the business. Purevdorj is a hardworking man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by making the workplace bigger than now so that I could continue the business in 4 seasons, not only in summer". The total amount he is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to build the workplace bigger.

loans.use: To build the workplace bigger

loans.name: Khorn

texts.en:
Khorn, 50, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish and groceries for over ten years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Her husband is a palm sugar producer who earns about USD 5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Khorn is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Rentsenzaya

texts.en: Rentsenzaya is a 49 years old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. Her husband is employed. She has been running agriculture and fruits plantation business since 2000. She plants the fruits in summertime and vegetables in autumn and wintertime. She trades the vegetables at the shopcounter and the big exhibitions. She got a certificate of the best vegetable grower. Rentsenzaya is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the necessary seeds for the autumn plantation. Based on my 12 years of experience, she wants to develop the business more". The total amount she is requesting is 500,000 MNT to purchase the seeds.

loans.use: To purchase the seeds

loans.name: Samba

texts.en: Samba is a 58 years old woman who lives with her grandson in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. Since her daughter died, she left to live with her daughter's son. She started garment retails business in 2000. First, she used to be alone for the business, now she has 2 shop counters and employes 2 assistants there. She brings the supplies from China. She has expanded the business significantly in those years. Samba is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to ecpand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities to save the transportation expenses. I have a further plan to save for my grandson's future". The total amount she is re questing is 2,000,000 MNT to buy more garment.

loans.use: To buy more garment

loans.name: Lort

texts.en:
Lort, 39, is married, resides with her husband and five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved agricultural business for over ten years has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up pigs. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are construction workers who earn about USD 6 per day. 

Due to lack of fund, Lort is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase maize seeds and fertilizer to start maize cultivation. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she plans to build a new house next year.

loans.use: to purchase maize seeds and fertilizer to start maize cultivation

loans.name: Oeun

texts.en:
Oeun, 50, is a farmer who lives in Reussey Keo commune with her husband and six children. She works related to rice farming with the support from her husband. She has been in this business for 14 years. Besides farming, another source of income produced by her husband by climbing palm trees for juice and sells them for profit.

Oeun is now asking for a loan to buy a used motorcycle to satisfy her living’s needs. Through using the loan, Oeun hopes that she can improve her family as well as business. She has been a client of HKL for three years. She has never made any late payment for her previous loans.

loans.use: to buy a used motorcycle to satisfy her living’s needs.

loans.name: Buyantogtoh

texts.en: Buyantogtoh is a 34 years old man who lives with his wife and 2 children in the northern province, Uvs, Mongolia. His wife is unemployed and the children are 1 and 8 years old. He has started a taxi service business 5 years ago. He has an experience on the field and has an advantage of knowing the routes well. He drives not only to the capital city, but also the neighbour provinces. He takes good care of the customers and the van to meet the demand. Buyantogtoh is a polite and hardworking man who says that "I would like to improve the business activity by buying a new car. I am planning to replace the previous car with a good one". The total amount he is requesting is 1,800,000 MNT to buy new car.

loans.use: To buy new car

loans.name: Chanthy's Group

texts.en: As a 52 year-old mother of five children, Chanthy supports her family by cultivating rice paddy and growing gingers. She lives in Saang district. All of her five kids are relying on the family. Chanthy has been with VisionFund since 2011 and recently she requested the second loan after the first one has completely repaid. Now, she leads a loan group of two members, all of whom are female. Chanthy requested the loan to buy ginger seeds and gasoline for her water pump. With this loan, she hopes to increase her family living standard by selling those gingers.

loans.use: To buy ginger seeds and gasoline for water pump

loans.name: Muhayokhon

texts.ru: Мухайёхон трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Она замужем и заботливая мать одного ребенка. В настоящее время её муж находится в России на заработках, и она сама содержит свою семью. Она работает бухгалтером в дехканском хозяйстве «Кодиров», её зарплата не хватает ей на покрытые  семейных расходов и дополнительно занимается купле- продажей скота и земледелием. Имеет 2 гектара земли, где выращивает плодовые деревья. На данный момент посеяла кукурузу на корм скоту. В обороте она имеет 6 голов крупного и 8 голов мелкого рогатого скота. С прибыли она купила себе автомашину марки «Тикко» и использует машину для своего бизнеса. Мухайёхон запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для урожайности земли и покупки скота для увлечения поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Muhayokhon is a hardworking and good woman. She is married and the caring mother of one child. Currently her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, and she supports the family herself. 

Muhayokhon works as an accountant at the dekhan farm "Kodirov", her salary is not enough to cover the family's expenses, and she is engaged in buying and selling of livestock and agriculture in addition. She owns to acres of land, where she grows fruit trees. Currently she has sown sweet corn as livestock fodder. She owns six heads of cattle and 8 heads of small livestock. For the profit she has bought a car (of the brand Tikko) and she uses this car for her business. 

Muhayokhon requests a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers for the productivity of the land and the purchase of livestock for increasing the herd.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and livestock

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn, 38, is married and resides with her husband and five children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved breeding pigs for over a year, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband runs the business of purchasing junk materials to resale. Approximately, he earns USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Saroeurn wants to run an additional business. Therefore, Saroeurn requests a loan of USD 1000 to rent farmland to start potato cultivation. This money will help her acquire the security in the business. 

In the future, she would like to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to carry junk materials to sell and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to rent farmland to start potato cultivatiion

loans.name: Nim

texts.en:
Nim (in the photo), age 62, is a widow mother with three children-two sons and one daughter. One is married and live separately, another one has full-time employment and another one is a garment worker. She lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Nim stays at home and does house work. The main source of income is from her children’s salary. She is in the process of building new house to stay, but the house does not finish yet. She asks for her first loan in the amount of $350 to make the finishes.

loans.use: To finish her house building.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap, 31, is married, resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over ten years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is employed in rubber plantation and earns about USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sopheap is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase rubber to resale. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run rubber plantation and help her children get bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase rubber to resale

loans.name: Sokhorn

texts.en:
Sokhorn is 30 years old and her husband, Ratha is 29 years old (pictured with their son), have been married since 2005 and have two young sons. The family lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Sokhorn sells grocery items at home, while her husband is a motor remoque taxi driver. A motor remoque is a motorbike connected with a trailer at the back. 

Sokhorn is asking for her a loan of $1,500 to expand her grocery inventory by buying more grocery items for resale.

loans.use: To expand her grocery inventory by buying more grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Chea (in the photo) is 33 years old and his wife, Phalla is 36 years old, lives in a village about fifteen kilometers form Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia. They have been married since 2002 and have two children-one son and one daughter. One attends school and another one is still young.

Chea is a construction worker, while his wife is a garment worker. He currently lives with his grandmother because he does not have his own. Hence, he is requesting his first loan of $700 to build a house to stay.

loans.use: To build his own house to stay.

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak (in the photo) is 25 years old and his wife, Voleak is 23 years old, lives in a village about fifteen kilometers form Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia. They have been married since 2009 and have two young sons.

Vannak is a security guard, while his wife is a cobbler in a shoe factory. Vannak is requesting his first loan of $1,200 to buy a motorbike to get work. He will also use a part of the loan to build a restroom for family use.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to get work and build a restroom for family use.

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea (in the photo), age 20, is single. She lives with her mother in a village about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia. 

Sophea sells cosmetic. She wants to expand her business by buying more cosmetics for resale. That’s why she is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,000.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Sultonboi

texts.ru: Султонбой женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Имеет семилетний опыт в скотоводстве и занимается купле продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он выращивает и откармливает 6 голов крупного рогатого скота с  телятами. Султонбой по специальности  тракторист и работает на АО «Ирам» и получает хорошую зарплату. Также он имеет 0,75 соток земли и выращивает кукурузу на корм скота. Султонбой запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью увлечения поголовья скота. Султонбой надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Sultonboi is married and is raising two children. He has seven years of experience in cattle breeding and he is engaged in buying and selling cattle. He raises and fattens six heads of cattle with calves. 

Sultonboi is a tractor-driver by profession, works at the company "Iram" and receives a good pay. Further he owns 0.75 acres of land and he grows sweet corn to feed the cattle. 

Sultonboi requests a loan for the purchase of cattle, with an aim to increase the cattle heard. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Sam Nang

texts.en:
Sam Nang (pictured here) is 23 years old and his wife, Srey Non is 25 years old, live in suburb of Phnom Penh about 25 kilometers. They have been married since 2008 and have one young daughter.  

Sam Nang is a construction contractor, while his wife is a garment worker. He is asking for his first loan of $1,000 to buy additional construction materials for his construction business.

loans.use: To buy additional construction materials.

loans.name: Khun

texts.en:
Khun (in photo) is 51 years old and her husband; Chhen is 58 years old, live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1985 and have one son and three daughters. One is married and lives outside the family home, two are garment workers and another one is still young.    

Khun is a rice farmer, while her husband is a house construction constructor and assists his wife in farming business when he is free. Khun is requesting her first loan in the amount of $200 to connect her house from private electricity utility service. Because her family does not have electricity to use, they use battery.

Photo: Khun is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To connect her house from electricity utility service for use.

loans.name: Ratha

texts.en:
Ratha (in the photo) sells groceries at home, while her husband, San is a security guard. They have been married since 2009 and have one young daughter. They live in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Ratha is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a motorcycle for her brother to get work.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her brother to get work.

loans.name: Makol

texts.en:
Makol (in the photo) is 24 years old and his wife; Channa is 24 years old, live in a suburb about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh. They have been married for one year and have no children yet. 

Makol and his wife are garment workers. He is applying for his first loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a motorcycle to get work.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to get work.

loans.name: Samnang

texts.en:
Samnang is 30 years old and his wife, Savy is 32 years old (pictured together), live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and they have two sons-one attends school and another one is still young. 

The family has three lines of business (1) Producing rice wine, (2) Raising pigs and (3) Selling grocery items. Samnang is asking for his first loan in the amount of $500 to purchasing additional grocery items for resale.

loans.use: To purchasing additional grocery items for sale.

loans.name: Hum's Group

texts.en: Age 37, Hum has been farming on her one hectare rice field and half hectare vegetables farm for 12 years. She is married and has three children, all of whom are still study. She earns two US dollars per day and is able to save around one US dollar a day. This is her first time with VisionFund. Hum requested the loan to cultivate rice and vegetables. She hopes to sell her crops for good price so that she can support her children until they finish high school. Now, Hum leads a loan group of three female members.

loans.use: To cultivate rice and vegetables

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Siek

texts.en:
Siek (pictured above) is 49 years old and her husband, Sak is 50 years old, live in a village in a suburb of Phnom Penh City and they have seven sons and three daughters. Three are married and live separately, two are garment workers, four attend school and another one is still young. 

Siek stays at home. The main source of income is from her husband and children’s salary. Her husband is a construction worker. Siek is applying for her first loan in the amount of $300 to buy a motorbike for her children to get work.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her children to get work.

loans.name: Kunthea

texts.en:
Kunthea and her husband, Tha are fishermen. She is applying for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to buy additional fishing materials. 

The couple has been married since 2003 and they have two daughters-one is in school and another one is still young. They live in a village about kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Photo: Kunthea and her husband.

loans.use: To buy additional fishing materials.

loans.name: Chan Oun

texts.en:
Chan Oun, 44, is married, resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a traditional musician who can earn about USD 3 per day. Two of her children are employed. They are garment worker and motor mechanic. They earn about USD 9 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Chan Oun is requesting for a loan of USD 600 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Savoeun

texts.en:
Savoeun (in the photo) is a garment worker and her husband, Channareth is a construction worker. They have been married since 2007 and they just have one young son. The family lives in a village about fifteen Kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 


Savoeun is requesting her first loan in the amount of $1,000 buy a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.name: Buntoeun

texts.en:
Buntoeun (pictured here) is 50 years old and her husband, Chhin is 50 years old, have been married since 1984 and have five children who are attending school. The family lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Buntoeun is a nail painter, she makes up and cleans fingers nail and toes nail. Her husband is a construction worker. She is asking for her first loan of $1,500 to a motorbike for commuting.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.name: Joni

texts.en:
Joni a 26 year old man is married and blessed with 2 children, named Tanto, 3 and Nancy, 2. Joni is a cattle supplier. He has been running the business for 6 years. Every week Joni seeks the best cattle in the local market and buys them from the trader to be resold.
Joni partners with his brother in running the business so they usually share the income earned. Joni was thinking to get more cattle for his own business. He plans to save money for his wife’s maternity cost. Therefore he submitted a loan application to TLM and requested a loan of IDR 10,000,000. The loan will be spent on 3 cattle.

loans.use: to purchase 3 cattle

loans.name: Eamsengchea

texts.en:
Eamsengchea (pictured with her young daughter) is 31 years old and her husband, Samnang is 34 years old, have been married since 2002 and have two children-one son and one daughter. One is in school and another one is still young. The family lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Eamsengchea and her husband are fishermen and grow rice when rice farming season come. She is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to fill-in the land behind of her house because there are some ponds in behind of her house, so she needs to fill it in. She will also use a part of the loan to build a fence around of her house.

loans.use: To fill-in the land behind of her house and build a fence around of her house.

loans.name: Khom

texts.en:
Khom (in the photo), age 39, is a widower by divorce. He lives with his with his elderly mother in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Khom is a policeman. He is applying for his first loan of $1,300 to buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Kan

texts.en:
Kan, 57, is married, resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband runs the business of USD buying cattle to resale. He earns about USD 6 per day. Two of her children are employed. They are garment construction worker and motor taxi driver. Approximately, they earn USD 7 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s living condition, Kan is requesting a loan of USD 800 to raise capital in her husband’s business for purchasing more cattle to resale. By doing so, he would be able to make more profit to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build fence around her house.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business for purchasing more cattle to resale

loans.name: Kimnhan

texts.en:
Kimnhan (in the photo), age 41, is a teacher. His wife, age 41, sells porridge and typical Khmer dessert in the school that her husband teaches. They live in a village about 12 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and they have three sons who are in school. 

One of Kimnhan’s sons is in his second year of his Economic University in Phnom Penh. Kimnhan is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 to pay school fees and buy a motorbike for his son to drive to school.

loans.use: To pay school fees and buy a motorbike for his son to drive to school.

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is 37 years old business woman. She operates a grocery store to her neighboring area. She has been in this business for over 6 years. She makes good sales every month which helps her managing the household expenses along with her husband. 
Her husband is involved in vegetables sales business. He buys vegetables from vegetable markets on cheap rates and sells to different other vegetable shops owners on profits. He goes out for his work in morning. Although his work requires time but he does it with full dedication. He loves dealing with people and has interest in it. He also makes good sales from his business. 
Naseem has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to improve her grocery store business. She will invest the loan in buying of groceries in larger quantity to put to her store for selling. 
She is hopeful that her business will be improved a lot after investing the loan into it.

loans.use: To buy groceries for grocery store business

loans.name: Yem's Group

texts.en: Yem, a 47 year-old mother of two, has been farming for twenty years to support her family. She and her family lives in a wooden house in a rural area of Tbaung Khmum district. After netting off income and expense, they can save only half US dollar per day. This is her first time with VisionFund. She requested the loan from VisionFund to cultivate rice field. Yem now leads a loan group of two female members. She hopes that this loan will enable her to make more income so that she can keep her children in school until finish high school.

loans.use: To cultivate rice field

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is 47 years old. He is married and lives in Vanadzor city with his wife and only son. Artur’s son is third year student of Haybusak University in Yerevan. Artur’s son is studying at medical department. Artur says that his son has always dreamed to be a doctor so after graduation he dreams will come true and he will treat sick people.  
Artur is a policeman and his wife is housewife.
Artur is asking for a 125.000 AMD loan to pay his son’s tuition fee for second semester. This is Artur’s second loan from Nor Horizon.

loans.use: to pay his son’s tuition fee for second semester

loans.name: Phavy

texts.en:
Phavy, 48, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing agricultural business for over ten years, has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle. Approximately, she earns USD 2 per day. Her husband is a driver who earns about USD 4 per day.

Due to the current salary is low, Phavy is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a Tuk Tuk for her husband to run public transportation service. This purchase would enable him to earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and help her youngest son get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase a Tuk Tuk for her husband to run public transportation service

loans.name: Homadi

texts.en: Homadi, 38, married man and has three children.  He lives in Sana`a, Yemen where he works selling chicken. The idea for the business started fourteen years ago where he acquired much experience which when he went off on his own to earn income he did not think of anything else but to start a micro business dedicated to selling chicken.  His business is located in strategic center which is a very busy commercial area. In his business of selling chicken, he has been known for the good customer service and this has permitted him to have a large clientele that guarantees good sales, and because of this his business has grown little by little. He is currently asking for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to buy Chicken skinning machine so he can offer a better variety to his customers and thus increase his sales. He hopes that in this way his business will continually capitalize itself and his earnings increase in order to offer his household a better quality of life. Also, Homadi hopes that with more income his family can enjoy a better quality of life and have better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy Chicken skinning machine for his business

loans.name: Berthi

texts.en:
Berthi is a 37 year old single lady. She is living with her father and cousins. She is a breadwinner in her family and is responsible in taking care of his father and to support her cousin’s schooling fees. Therefore, Berthi runs a kiosk business. She has been running the kiosk business for years
To generate more income Berthi plans to complete her kiosk business with more stock. Berthi got information that TLM provided a loan for those who have small business. She then submitted a loan application and requested a loan amounting to IDR 4,500,000 from TLM. She would like to spend the loan on kiosk stocks such as soft drinks, snacks, and nine daily basic items. She is expecting the loan can help her in generating a better income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase kiosk stocks such as soft drinks, snacks, and nine daily basic items

loans.name: Vanh

texts.en:
Vanh, 51, is married, resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a farm worker who earns about USD 3 per day. Two of her children are garment workers. They earn about USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Vanh is requesting a loan of USD 800 to purchase cattle to breed in order to resale for a profitable price when they gain weight. By doing so, she would generate more profit to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest son get bachelor’s degree. Moreover she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to resale for a profitable price when they gain weihgt

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 34 years old married woman, she lives in Madaba, Jordan. She is a mother of 2 children.
Hanan is looking to have a loan of 400JDs; to increase her income she will buy mobiles, mobiles' charging cards and accessories.

loans.use: to buy mobiles, accessories & charging cards

loans.name: Met's Group

texts.en: Met, age 38, is a mother of three. All of them are still in school. Her family lives in a wooden house and has been farming for 17 years. They are now able to save up enough money to build a proper house. Having received two previous loans from VisionFund, Met is now requesting for another loan to cultivate rice and vegetables on her 2 hectare land. She now leads a loan group of three female members. The loan will help to generate more income to sufficiently support her family and also set aside money for her children study until finish.

loans.use: To cultivate rice and vegetables

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Sarath

texts.en:
Sarath, 40, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is construction worker who earns about USD 5. One of her children is a construction worker as well and he earns about USD 3 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s economy, Sarath is requesting a loan of USD 1300 to purchase groceries to resale at home. By doing so, she would generate more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children get bachelor’s degree

loans.use: to purchase groceries to resale at home

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is 49 years old married woman, she is a mother of 4 children, she lives in Jabal Al- Hussain, Jordan.
Huda is looking to have a loan of 500JDs to improve her living level; she will sell and buy cosmetics.

loans.use: to sell cosmetics and buy it

loans.name: Mervat

texts.en:
Mervat is 44 years old married woman she is a mother of 3 children. she lives in Al Hashmi, Jordan.
Mervat is looking to have a loan of 500JDs, thus she can improve her living level by buying and selling cosmetics.

loans.use: to purchase accessories and cometics and buy it

loans.name: Yuslin

texts.en:
Yuslin is a 34 year old single lady. She is living with her parents. Yuslin has been involved in kiosk business for more than 2 years. It is located in front of her house. She sells daily needs such as shampoo, instant noodle, snacks, cigarettes etc. Since Yuslin is living in a rural area then the products can be sold quickly. The profit from the business is spent to support her family living costs.
For this business can give contribution to the community in the village then she was thinking to complete her kiosk with greater variety of stock such as bath soap, detergent, shampoo, etc. This situation led her to seek a loan of IDR 5,000,000 from TLM.

loans.use: to purchase stock such as bath soap, detergent, shampoo, etc

loans.name: Farah

texts.en:
Farah is a Palestinian young man, he is married and a father with four children.
For the past four years, Farah has been making and selling wooden crafts which are hand made crafts from olive wood, which has been a profitable project, but also not much enough to cover all the costs.

Farah is requesting a 2,500 USD loan, from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing bulk of raw material which is necessary to make crafts, such as: olive wood and collection of paints. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.
Farah has a picture while he is making crafts from olive wood.

loans.use: To purchase bulk of olive wood and collection of paints

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en: Pov, a 43 year-old married mother of three girls, is now a leader of a loan group of two female members. Her and her member lives in a rural area of Kompong Cham province. Pov, after completely repaid the first loan, requested another loan from VisionFund to buy fertilizers, rice seeds and cultivate her rice farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase crop yield and therefore earn her more income to expand her business, build on some savings and build a proper house for the family. Before the loan from VisionFund, Pov’s business usually met difficulties such as natural disasters and insufficient investment.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, rice seeds and cultivate rice farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Savoeurn

texts.en:
Savoeurn, 38, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been running the business of providing make up service and costumes in wedding ceremony for over ten years, earning approximately USD 15 per day. Additionally, her husband is a photographer who earns about USD 5 per day. Two of her children are employed in garment factory. Approximately, they earn USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Savoeurn is requesting a loan of USD 1500 to purchase more cosmetics and costumes to use in her business. This purchase would enable her to provide new and fashionable clothes to the clients. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics and costumes to use in her business

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, 49, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 13 per day. Two of her children are garment workers who earns about USD 5 per day. Sokha wants to build a new house. 

With this goal in mind, Sokha requests a loan of USD 800 to purchase timbers to construct a new house. This purchase will enable her to provide convenient house for her family’s living. 

In the future, she would like to purchase more farmland to expand her agricultural business and help her children get bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase timbers to construct a new house

loans.name: Soa'ad

texts.en:
Soa'ad is 54 years old widow woman, she is a mother of 2 children. she lives in Al Hashmi, Jordan.
Soa'ad is looking to have a loan of 800JDs, so she can improve her house living conditions and fix some stuff.

loans.use: to improve her house conditions

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta runs agricultural business in Tsovagyugh village, Sevan area. She and her husband breed cows, sheep and chickens. Also they ate engaged in bee-keeping. Julieta sells produced milk to dairy company and meat she sells to butcher’s shop. Julieta says that bee-keeping takes a lot of work and time but she likes to produce a high quality honey for her family. Sometimes she sells part of honey to her neighbors as well. Thanks to agricultural business Julieta and her husband keeps their family.
Julieta is 55 years old. Her children are adult and they are married and live separately from parents.  
Julieta is seeking for a 350.000 AMD loan to buy a large lot of fodder for her farm animals.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of fodder for her farm animals

loans.name: Samoeurn

texts.en:
Samoeurn, 62, is widowed and resides with two children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Two of her children are employed. They are construction worker and motor taxi driver. Approximately, they earn USD 5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Samoeurn requests a loan of USD 1500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run a motor repair shop for her son and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 58 years old married man, he is a father of 4 children. he lives in Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan.
Khaled is looking to have a loan of 500JDs to buy an agrictultural material to increase his farm prodcutivity and improve quality of his crops.

loans.use: to purchase agricultral supplies for his farm

loans.name: Farkiniso

texts.ru: Фаркинисо умная,трудолюбивая,ответственная женщина в возрасти 48 лет.она замужем и на воспитании имеет четверых детей.Более 6 лет она  занимается купле-продажей малого рогатого скота. В месяц 2-3 раза ездит с мужем на рынок и покупает скот. Откармливает в течении  одного месяца и снова продает на скотном рынке.В бизнесе ей помогают её дети и муж. А её муж частный таксист и он очень уважает свою жену и детей.Они все вмести дружно работают.От данного бизнеса она получает хороший доход и постоянно улучшает свое благосостояние семьи.Фаркинисо запрашивает займ для покупки малого рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса.Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Farkiniso is a smart, hard-working, responsible woman at the age of 48. She is married and is raising four children. She has been engaged in buying and selling small livestock for more than six years. She goes to the market 2-3 times per month together with her husband to buy livestock. Then she fattens them for about one month and again sells the livestock at the market. 

Her husband and children helps her in her business. Her husband is a private taxi driver and he respects his wife and children very much. They all work together. From this business she receives a good income and constantly improves the family's well-being. 

Farkiniso asks for a loan for the purchase of small livestock with an aim to expand her business. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase small livestock

loans.name: Ghadeeer

texts.en:
Ghadeer is 24 years old married woman, she is a mother of 2 childs and she lives in Al Zarqa, Jordan.
Ghadeer is looking to have a loan of 400JDs thus she can purchase clothes and buy it to people so she can continue her university studies.
Ghadeer is under 30 years so her loan is consider as youth one.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and buy it

loans.name: Sor's Group

texts.en: As a mother of two, Sor supports her family by farming. She also raises pigs to generate additional income. She lives in a wooden house in a rural area of Preahnet Preah district. Sor has been with VisioFund since 2011. She regularly repaid her obligations to VisionFund. Currently, she requested another loan to cultivate rice paddy, buy fertilizers and feeds for her pigs. From this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yields and her pigs grow healthily so that she can sell them for good price and therefore enable her earn more income to sufficiently feed her family. Pov is now a leader of a loan group of four members.

loans.use: To cultivate rice paddy and buy fertilizers and feeds for pigs

location.town: Preahnet Preah district, Banteay Meanchey Province

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch, 51, is widowed and resides with two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years. Additionally, she sell Khmer noodle at home to generate extra income to support the family. Approximately, she earns USD 5 per day. Two of her children are employed. They earn USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Touch is requesting a loan of USD 800 to purchase rice seeds to start rice cultivation. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds to start rice cultivation

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is 32 years old she is married woman, she lives in Al Zarqa, Jordan.
Huda is looking to have a loan of 400JDs to sell cosmetics and accesorries so she can increase her income.

loans.use: to sell and buy cosmetics and makeup

loans.name: Tamam

texts.en:
Tamam is 49 years old widow woman, a mother of 4 children. she lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan.
Tamam is looking to have a loan of 500JDs so she can buy new furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy new furniture for her house

loans.name: Rihab

texts.en:
Rihab is a conservative woman, she is unwilling to upload her photo on internet. the photo is for husband.
Rihab is a 25 years old married woman. she is a mother of 1 child. she lives in Al Nasser, Jordan.
Rihab is looking to have a loan of 400JDs so she can expand her trade in comsetics which help her to increase her income.
Rihab is under 30 years old so her loan is youth.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Phat

texts.en:
Phat, 38, is married, resides with her husband and six children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over twenty years, have an extensive experience and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice and fishing. Approximately, they earn USD 5 per day. Four of her children are employed. They are construction workers and garment workers. They earn about USD 12 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Phat is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to purchase more farmland to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en: To support the family, she works as a farmer for twenty years. She supplements her income by selling fish. Phalla, age 41, is married and a mother of three. She and her members are a villager of Mongkol Borei district. She now leads a loan group of three members. Phalla regularly repaid her previous three loans to VisionnFund. She currently requested another loan of US$250 to cultivate her rice farm and buy fish for reselling. She hopes the loan will enable her to generate more income and therefore afford her family for sufficient food, household equipment and buy more land for farming.

loans.use: To cultivate rice field and buy fish for reselling

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkol Borey District

loans.name: Pong

texts.en:
Pong, 63, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been running the business of purchasing junk materials to resale for over ten years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Three of her children are employed in garment factory. They earn about USD 8 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s economy, Pong is requesting a loan of USD 800 to raise capital in her business to purchase more junk materials to resale. By doing so, she would be able to make more profit to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to purchase a motorbike to carry junk materials to sell and rebuild her present house to make more convenient for her family’s living.

loans.use: to raise capital in her business to purchase more junk materials to resale

loans.name: Khetam

texts.en:
Khetam is 38 years old married woman, she is a mother of 6 children. she lives in Sahab, Jordan.
Khetam is looking to have a loan of 400JDs to buy furniture for her home and to fix it so it can be more healthy.

loans.use: to fix her home and buy furniture for it

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is 50 years old married woman. she lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan. she is a mother of 4 children.
Amal is looking to have a loan of 500JDs to purchase a raw material for embroidery so she can increase her income to help her son get married.

loans.use: to buy raw material for Embroidery and Sewing

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is 48 years old married woman. she lives in Al Zarqa, Jordan. she is a mother of 5 children.
Hanan is looking to have a loan of 600JDs so she can buy fruits and vegatbles which can help her to open her own store in the future.
Hanan is an conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on internet. the photo is for her son.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Kurbon

texts.ru: Курбон женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Жена работает уборщицей. Более 10 лет Курбон занимается купле- продажей сельхозпродуктов. В основном он продает картошку и лук. Курбон хочет создать своей семье уют и комфорт, с этой целью он старается расширить свой бизнес. Курбон хотел бы получить займ для покупки картофеля и лука для пополнения оборотного капитала с целью расширения бизнеса. Курбон надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.

loans.use: To buy potatoes and onions for sell

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is 34 years old married woman and by this relationship she has four children: three sons and one daughter. Besides her eldest son, rest of others is getting education.  
Her husband does a private job on monthly wage. His income is not sufficient to meet the financial expenses of the family that’s why Razia helps him by running a canteen business. She also knows the sewing skills which she does in weekends.   
She runs a canteen in a school where she serves the children with her food items like cold drinks, Samosas, chips and Kababs. She makes good earnings from her canteen business.  
She has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her canteen business. She will invest the loan in buying of material like cold drinks, cooking oil, spices, flour and potatoes for her canteen business. 
She is hopeful that her business will get improved after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy food material for canteen business

loans.name: Maysoon

texts.en:
Maysoon is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on internet. the photo is for her husband. 
Maysoon is 38 years old married woman. she is a mother of 4 children. she lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan.
Maysoon is looking to have a loan of 800JDs to buy furniture for her house and to paint it.

loans.use: to improve her house conditions

loans.name: Jean Damascene

texts.en:
Damascene is 37 years old and is married with 5 children aged 2 and 13 years old. He sells various goods such as:lotions, rice, soap, sugar, soft drinks etc to sell. 

Damascene has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such: lotions, rice, soap, sugar, soft drinks etc to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To buy various goods such as: lotions, rice, soap, sugar, soft drinks etc to sell.

loans.name: Jumakhon

texts.ru: Чумахон трудолюбивый и добросовестный юноша. Он очень активный и более 1, 5 года  занимается купле- продажей запчастей для легковых автомобилей. Данный бизнес приносит ему стабильный доход и за счет своего бизнеса он помогает своим родителям. Чумахон хотел бы получить займ для покупки автозапчастей с целью расширения бизнеса и пополнения оборотного капитала. Чумахон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.

loans.use: To buy spare parts in order to expand his business

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 33 years old and is married with six children aged between 6 and 15 years old and she takes care of two relatives. She owns sewing business and she has been in this business for 8 years. Christine currently employs three people to help her.

Christine has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her her sewing business by buying more machine. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and to to build her own house.

loans.use: To expand her sewing business by buying more machine.

loans.name: Chamnan

texts.en:
Chamnan (in the photo), age 31, is a lathe operator. His wife Sila, age 29, stays at home. They have been married since 2005 and have two daughters-one is in school and another one is still young. They live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.   

Chamnan is requesting his first loan in the amount of $1,000 to repair the house where he lives by making new walls.

loans.use: To repair the house where he lives by making new walls.

loans.name: Sameeha

texts.en:
Sameeha is 58 years old widow woman she is a mother of 4 children. she lives in Al Aqaba, Jordan.
Sameeha is looking to have a loan of 600JDs so she can develop her work of making pies and pastries which will help her in the future to open her own baking store.

loans.use: to develop her work of making Pies and Pastries

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru:
Динаре 46 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. С 1997 года Динара занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время в хозяйстве Динары имеется  1 дойная корова, 1 лошадь и 15 овец,  ежемесячная прибыль от продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет примерно 9,000 сом (KGS).  В сезон, Динара получает прибыль от продажи фасоли, получаемой с 1,20 га орошаемой земли, также на придомовой территории находится яблоневый сад, приносящий около 80,000 сом (KGS) в год.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Динара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Динара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Nyamaa

texts.en: Mrs. Nyamaa, 39 has been selling the all kind of clothes in the bazaar since 2007 non-stop. She lives with her husband and her daughter, 7 in a ger, a Mongolian nomadic yurt which is in the suburban district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She owns a rental stall in bazaar and she pays MNT 200.000 every month for rent fee. Lately her business earnings have been decreased notably in due to has a less sales volume. It influences badly for her family income. This year her daughter is going to enter the primary school. It means that she needs more money to pay her school fees and other expenses related. Now she needs to increase her inventories for expanding her sales volume. The loan she is taking will be dedicated to purchase the clothes from her supplier.

loans.use: To purchase the clothes from her supplier.

loans.name: Alijon

texts.ru: Аличон трудолюбивый и добрый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 6 лет Аличон занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он откармливает и ухаживает за скотом дома, а также имеет хорошие условия для их содержания. Аличон хотел бы получить займ на покупку автомашины для перевозки скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.

loans.use: To buy a car

loans.name: Erdenetuya

texts.en: Mrs. Erdenetuya, 28 has a selling business of women clothes. At her home she makes and sews the outfit clothe of women and her husband Munkhbaatar sells them to the customers in bazaar. She has been doing her business for 11 years. Initially she started her business with her mother. Now she runs it with her husband. She lives with her husband and her daughter, 2 sons in a ger, a Mongolian nomadic yurt which is in the suburban district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Lately her business earnings have been decreased notably in due to has a less sales volume. It influences badly for her family income. Therefore she needs to increase her inventories for expanding her sales volume. The loan she is taking will be dedicated to purchase the raw materials for more output.

loans.use: To purchase the raw materials for more output.

loans.name: Nafeesa

texts.en:
Nafeesa is 62 years old widow woman, she lives in Al Hashmi, Jordan. She is a mother of 1 child.
Nafeesa is looking to have a loan of 500JDs to improve her house living conditions.

loans.use: to improve her house living conditions

loans.name: Angin

texts.en:
Angin has been engaged in animal breeding and land cultivation more than 18 years. On her farm Angin breeds 2 cows, 2 calves and 7 sheep as well. Also she grows potato and wheat on her own small plot of land. Produced milk and meat Angin sells to re-sellers and potato she sells at food market. Wheat and part of agricultural produce Angin uses for her family’s needs.
Angin is 47 years old. She lives in Ddmashen village, Sevan area. She is married and has 3 children. Simultaneously with agricultural business Angin works as an accountant at village outpatients' clinic. Her husband now is working in Russia; her younger son is serving in Armenian army. Angin’s daughter is a student. Angin’s elder son is helping mother in agricultural business and thus they provide family and pay for Angin’s daughter’s education.  
Angin is asking for $ 1.600 loan to buy potato seedlings and fertilizer ahead of sowing season.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and fertilizer ahead of sowing season

loans.name: Jamila

texts.ru: Чамила умная и честная девушка, ей 21 года. Она студентка 3-го курса Худжандского Университета. Она учиться на факультете «Иностранных языков» по специальности английский язык. На равне с отличной учебой, Чамила активно участвует в общественной жизни университета. Является делегатом Молодежного Парламента Республики Таджикистан, секретарем Студенческого Совета Университета, а также получает стипендию Председателя Области. В будущем хочет стать преподавателем английского языка. Чамила хотела бы получить займ для оплаты обучения в университете. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.

loans.use: To pay for education

loans.name: Rohat

texts.ru: Рохат - женщина 50 лет, мать четверых детей,ее муж  работает мастером по ремонту домов.Сама Рохат работает продавцом в кондитерском ларьке, в центре города.Она продаёт торты и разнообразные кондитерские изделия.Продукция данного цеха очень вкусная и качественная, поэтому у Рохат продажа всегда в разгаре.Она кредитуется уже второй год, и на следующий кредит хочет продолжить ремонт дома, который был начат при получении предыдущего займа.Мастеров Рохат не нанимает, т.к. её муж сам справляется с ремонтом.Рохат хочет покрыть крышу металлическим шифером, т.к такая крыша более водостойкая и прочная.

loans.use: repair a home

loans.name: Hassina

texts.en:
Hassina is 35 years old and is married with four children aged between 4 and 16 years old and she takes care of one relative child . She sells milk and fertilizer and she has been in this business for two years. Hassina currently employs one person to help her.

Hassina has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her breeding cows by buying more cows to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To expand her breeding cows by buying more cows to sell.

loans.name: Afeefa

texts.en:
Afeefa is 51 years old married woman. she lives in Jabal Al Hussain, Jordan. she is a mother of 3 children.
Afeefa want take a loan of 800 JDs to buy material for her Beauty Saloon and she want also to renew some stuff in the saloon.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for her Beauty Saloon
